Package kulami.connectivity

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InProtocolObserver
    Each object that wants to handle incoming server messages has to implement the InProtocolObserver interface.
    MessageObserver
    Each object that wants to receive incoming server messages from the ServerProxy has to implement the MessageObserver interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MessageSender
    The MessageSender class contains methods that correspond to messages that the Kulami server expects from clients.
    ServerAdapter
    The ServerAdapter decomposes Kulami client/server protocol messages and delegates to the corresponding methods of an InProtocolObserver.
    ServerProxy
    A ServerProxy establishes a connection to a Kulami server and receives server messages and sends messages to the server.
